name: The Object
description: A strange object, I don't really know what it is, what its for or why it exists. If you do, please let me know

name: A Beech Tub
description: A tub, made from elm. It did originally have a lid, but apparently if you turn grean wood; things expand..

name: Pizza Wheel
description: A top quality pizza slicer with a Sapele handle. Made out of jealousy when a friend got a new pizza oven.

name: Magnifying Glass
description: A Magifying glass with a beech handle

name: A Boul Bowl
description: A bowl made from a vintage boul, its full of wierd fractures and cracks from its former life. It kinda looks like an urn if i'm honest.
